title: Genius Global Platform
description: A comprehensive gaming ecosystem with integrated marketplace, tournaments, and social features. Features include global esports competitions, leaderboards, mission systems, daily rewards, and a complete e-commerce platform for buying/selling digital goods, gaming cards, and subscriptions. Users can compete, and earn rewards in one unified platform.
features: **Browser Game Collection:** Play Snake, Memory Game, 2048, Typing Speed games directly in browser
**Gaming Categories Hub:** Browse games by category: Arcade, Strategy, Brain, Puzzle, Skills, Luck
**Tournament Management System:** Create, join, and manage esports events with registration and results
**Global Esports Tournaments:** Daily, weekly, and monthly competitions with cash prizes up to 75,000 coins
**Live Leaderboards:** Real-time rankings with player stats, points, and win counts
**Advanced Profile Customization:** Custom background videos, music, social links, and location settings
**Profile Music Player:** Add custom audio tracks to profiles with MP3 support
**Background Video System:** Upload custom video backgrounds with filter controls (black & white)
**Social Media Integration:** Connect Twitter, Instagram, GitHub, YouTube, and personal websites
**Mission & Achievement System:** Complete missions to earn badges (Diamond, Star, Programmer, Support)
**Daily Rewards & Login Streaks:** Claim daily bonuses and maintain login streaks for premium rewards
**Live Location Features:** Share and update location with country/city selection
**Integrated Marketplace:** Buy and sell digital goods including game cards, subscriptions, and software
**Product Categories:** Organized marketplace with Gaming, Subscriptions, Entertainment, and Software sections
**Shopping Cart & Checkout:** Full e-commerce functionality with secure payment processing
**Future Tech Store:** Curated collection of premium gadgets and digital lifestyle products
**Real-time Notifications:** Live updates for tournaments, marketplace transactions, and rewards
**Points & Rewards Economy:** Earn and spend points across gaming and marketplace features
**Gift & Reward System:** Unlock exclusive in-game items and double rewards
**User Statistics Dashboard:** Track points, wins, sales, purchases, and tournament history
**Search & Discovery:** Find games, products, and tournaments with advanced search functionality
**Multi-language Interface:** Support for multiple languages with English as primary
**Payment Gateway Integration:** Support for Credit Card, PayPal, and other payment methods
**Responsive Design:** Optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices

title: GeniusBot - Ultimate Discord Server Management System
description: A comprehensive Discord bot management system with advanced security, moderation, automation, and administration tools. Features include sophisticated welcome system designer, auto-reply engine, server protection suite, security scanning, advertisement management, admin controls, and real-time monitoring dashboard.
features: **Advanced Welcome System:** Complete welcome image designer with layer-based editing and live Discord preview
**Welcome Image Designer:** Professional editor with layers (text, avatar, background, message) and canvas size presets
**Welcome & Leave Messages:** Configure automatic messages for member join/leave events with channel assignment
**Message Variables:** Support for dynamic variables: (user), (server), (memberCount), (date), (time)
**Text Editor Settings:** Advanced text customization (font family, size, color, alignment, positioning)
**Avatar Controls:** Profile image adjustments with frames, positioning (X/Y coordinates), and scaling
**Background Customization:** Background image controls with filters, positioning, and overlay options
**Server Protection Suite:** Comprehensive security system with threat blocking and monitoring
**Bot Management Controls:** Disallow unauthorized bots and prevent duplicate message spam
**Moderation Controls:** Advanced kick/ban policies with maximum limits and punishment options
**Bad Words Filter:** Customizable bad words list with configurable punishments (warn, delete, kick, ban)
**Link Protection System:** Block Discord server invites and specific links/keywords
**Channels Content Filtering:** Configure content permissions per channel (images, text, files, bot commands)
**Security Scanning System:** Comprehensive server scan for permissions and security risks
**Dangerous Permissions Detection:** Identify members/bots with administrative permissions
**Auto Reply System:** Smart automatic response system with trigger keywords and responses
**Multi-response Support:** Multiple response variations for each trigger keyword
**Advertisement System:** Create and manage server advertisements with scheduling
**Publishing Options:** Immediate or scheduled publishing with specific date/time
**Admin Management System:** Add/remove admins with access control to dashboard
**Access Control:** Server owner controls all admin access with immediate revocation
**Admin Permissions:** Automatic Discord admin privileges for dashboard access
**Activity Logging System:** Comprehensive logging of all bot and member activities
**System Logs:** Technical logs for troubleshooting and system monitoring
**Comprehensive Data Backup System:** Full backup of server settings, channels, roles, and permissions
**Backup History Management:** View, restore, or delete backup copies with detailed timestamps and content summaries
**One-Click Restore Functionality:** Restore server to any previous backup state with confirmation dialogs
**Quick Access Menu:** Fast navigation to all dashboard pages and tools
**Notifications Center:** Real-time notifications for bot events and updates
**Color Themes:** Multiple UI themes (Blue & Gold, Purple & Pink, Green & Emerald, Red & Orange)
**Search Functionality:** Search commands, settings, members, and advertisements
**Premium Features:** Advanced tools available with premium subscription upgrade
**24/7 Support:** Dedicated support system for server administrators
**Responsive Design:** Optimized for all devices with intuitive navigation
**Real-time Updates:** Live updates without page refresh using WebSockets

title: University LMS Platform
description: A comprehensive three-tier Learning Management System for universities with fully-featured portals for Students, Instructors, and Administration. Complete solution including academic management, course scheduling, analytics dashboard, announcements system, and integrated social communication platform with real-time chat and collaboration tools.
features: **Student Portal:** Course registration, assignment submission, grade viewing, academic tracking, schedule management, progress monitoring, GPA calculation, announcement viewing, social networking

**Instructor Portal:** Course management, student grading system, assignment creation & evaluation, attendance tracking, progress analytics, student performance reports, grade management, communication tools

**Admin Portal:** Complete institutional management including user administration, course scheduling, academic analytics, registration settings, system configuration, announcements management, and moderation tools
**Integrated Communication Platform:** Real-time messaging system with direct messages, group chats, course-specific channels, and announcement boards
**Academic Analytics Dashboard:** Real-time student performance metrics, course success rates, GPA distribution analysis, institutional KPIs, completion rate tracking
**Course Management System:** Comprehensive course catalog with prerequisites, credit hours, scheduling, instructor assignment, and course group management
**Smart Registration Engine:** Registration system with GPA-based credit hour conditions, prerequisite validation, automated scheduling, and approval workflows
**Collaboration Tools:** Group creation and management, file sharing, media galleries, poll creation, and discussion forums
**Social Networking Features:** User profiles, direct messaging, study groups, academic communities, and peer networking
**Announcements & Polling System:** University-wide announcement platform with targeted messaging, scheduling, polls, and multi-language support
**Communication Channels:** Department-specific channels, course discussion groups, administrative announcements, and peer support networks
**Real-time Chat:** Instant messaging with message history, file sharing, read receipts, and notification management
**Group Management:** Advanced group settings with role-based permissions, moderation tools, and version control for announcements
**Registration Approvals:** Automated workflow for course registration approvals/rejections with detailed tracking and notifications
**Grade Management:** Comprehensive grading system with flexible grading scales, percentage calculations, and status indicators
**Team & Collaboration:** Course-specific team creation with member assignment, shared resources, and communication tools
**Real-time Notifications:** Automated alerts for deadlines, schedule changes, registration updates, academic announcements, and new messages across all roles

title: GAD Business Services Platform
description: A comprehensive business services platform offering creative solutions in design, development, and printing. Modern digital hub with advanced animations, light/dark mode, and bilingual support (English/Arabic). Features client registration system, service packages, and complete business solutions from startup to enterprise level.
features: **Advanced Animation System:** Professional animations for smooth transitions, micro-interactions, and engaging UI effects
**Light/Dark Mode:** Complete theme switching system with persistent user preferences and seamless transition animations
**Bilingual Support (EN/AR):** Full multilingual implementation with i18next, RTL/LTR layout switching, and language persistence
**Service Selection Wizard:** Interactive form to choose required services (Design, Programming, Printing) with multi-selection capability
**Multi-Service Platform:** Integrated platform offering design, development, and printing services under one roof
**Design Services:** Logo design, branding, UI/UX design with innovative creative solutions
**Programming Solutions:** Custom website development, mobile apps, advanced web applications, and dashboard systems
**Printing Services:** High-quality printing for business cards, brochures, banners, and customized packaging
**Client Feedback System:** Integrated rating and feedback system with client testimonials and reviews
**Multi-Channel Support:** Contact through Facebook, WhatsApp (multiple numbers), and direct communication channels
**Animated Page Transitions:** Smooth page transitions and scroll-triggered animations throughout the platform
**Efficient Project Delivery:** Focus on fast, efficient service delivery with high client satisfaction rates
**Accessibility Features:** Enhanced accessibility with theme contrast options and language support

title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A comprehensive full-featured Arabic e-commerce platform with modern UI/UX, multi-category product management, user accounts, shopping cart, order tracking, and secure payment integration. Complete solution including customer reviews, favorites/wishlists, address management, and real-time order notifications.
features: **Multi-Category Products:** Display and filter products across diverse categories (Electronics, Clothing, Sports, Books, Beauty & Personal Care)
**Product Detail Page:** Comprehensive product display with specifications, ratings, images, and stock status
**Customer Review System:** Genuine customer ratings and reviews with helpfulness voting
**Shopping Cart Management:** Manage cart items with quantity updates and subtotal calculations
**User Profile Dashboard:** Complete user account with profile picture, personal information, and preferences
**Wishlist/Favorites System:** Save desired products for future purchase in a wishlist
**Address Management:** Add, edit, and delete multiple shipping addresses
**Order Tracking System:** Track orders with shipment status timeline (Confirmed, Shipping, Transit, Delivered)
**Payment Management:** Save multiple payment cards and view transaction history
**Advanced Settings:** Control notifications, privacy, security, and appearance (Dark Mode)
**Advanced Search:** Product search with filtering by category and price range
**Deals & Discounts:** Display products with special offers and coupon code system
**Featured Products:** Display best-selling and highest-rated products
**Shipment Tracking:** Track shipment numbers and estimated delivery details
**Order Filtering:** View orders by status (Delivered, Shipped, Processing, Cancelled)

title: BotMaster - Comprehensive Bot Owner Management Dashboard
description: A complete management system for Discord bot owners featuring real-time bot analytics, integrated store system, website analytics, financial tracking, advertisement management, and comprehensive system monitoring. Designed for bot developers and administrators to manage all aspects of their bot ecosystem in one unified dashboard.
features: **Owners Dashboard:** Centralized control panel for bot owners with quick access to all management tools
**Real-time Bot Overview:** Live monitoring of total servers, users, uptime, and system status with daily updates
**Comprehensive Statistics:** Detailed analytics showing server growth, user retention, and command usage patterns
**Growth Analysis Dashboard:** Monthly performance comparison with visual metrics for server growth and user retention
**Top Performing Servers:** Leaderboard showing servers with highest activity and engagement rates
**Daily Activity Log:** Timeline of significant bot events including new server joins and user milestones
**Store Management System:** Complete e-commerce solution for selling digital products and services
**Product Catalog Management:** Add, edit, and manage products with categories, pricing, and inventory tracking
**Hero Section Configuration:** Customizable featured product display on store homepage
**Website Analytics Suite:** Real-time tracking of website performance, traffic sources, and user behavior
**Top Visited Pages:** Detailed breakdown of most popular pages by views, unique visitors, and bounce rates
**Live Activity Feed:** Real-time monitoring of visitor actions (page views, clicks, form submissions)
**Ads & Finance Control:** Complete financial management system with income and expense tracking
**Advertisement Management:** Control external website ads across multiple pages (Store, Games, Explore, Servers)
**Ad Campaign Configuration:** Set duration, target views, image URLs, and target links for each ad slot
**Financial Dashboard:** Overview of total income, expenses, net profit, and pending transactions
**Income Sources Breakdown:** Detailed tracking of revenue from server promotions, project features, and other sources
**Expense Management:** Record and categorize all business costs with payment method tracking
**System Logs Monitor:** Comprehensive logging system tracking all service activities across the platform
**Real-time Event Tracking:** Live monitoring of website, bot, and system events with timestamps
**Error Detection & Diagnostics:** Detailed error logs with problem descriptions and stack traces
**Log Filtering & Search:** Advanced filtering by date range, event type, and source for efficient troubleshooting
**Owner Access Control:** Secure dashboard access limited to bot owners and authorized administrators
**Responsive Dashboard Design:** Optimized for desktop and mobile access with intuitive navigation
**Real-time Data Updates:** Live updates using WebSockets for instant statistics and activity reflection
**Scalable Architecture:** Designed to handle growing user bases and increasing transaction volumes

title: GAD Admin Dashboard
description: A comprehensive admin dashboard for managing GAD Business Services Platform. Features complete request management, project tracking, client administration, and real-time analytics with interactive charts and statistics. Includes secure authentication, and multi-service project management.
features: **Secure Admin Authentication:** Protected login system with username/password authentication and session management
**Dashboard Analytics Overview:** Comprehensive dashboard showing total requests, projects, and key metrics at a glance
**Real-time Statistics:** Live statistics for Total Requests (20), Design Projects (15), Programming Projects (10), Printing Projects (12)
**Client Request Management:** Complete system to view, manage, and track all client requests with filtering capabilities
**Client Database:** Detailed client listing with company name, size, contact numbers, WhatsApp numbers, and business requirements
**Interactive Data Tables:** Sortable and filterable tables showing client information with actions for each entry
**Project Categorization:** Projects organized by service type (Design, Programming, Printing) and client size (Personal to Enterprise)
**Visual Analytics Dashboard:** Pie charts and graphs showing project distribution (Design 50%, Programming 30%, Printing 20%)
**Total Projects Overview:** Summary view showing 33 total projects with service breakdown
**Pending Requests Tracking:** Dedicated section to track and manage pending client requests
**Add New Request Functionality:** Interface for administrators to add new client requests manually
**Contact Management:** Centralized contact information management including multiple phone numbers and WhatsApp integration
**Responsive Admin Interface:** Fully responsive dashboard that works on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
**Bulk Actions:** Perform actions on multiple clients or projects simultaneously

title: Enterprise Inventory Management System (IMS)
description: A comprehensive enterprise-grade inventory management solution with complete business management features including store inventory, customer relationship management (CRM), advanced analytics, financial reporting, user permissions. Designed specifically for the Saudi market with VAT compliance and local business requirements.
features: **Complete Business Management Suite:** All-in-one solution covering inventory, sales, customers, finance, and reporting
**Real-time Stock Monitoring:** Live inventory tracking with low-stock alerts, reorder points, and stock level notifications
**Advanced Product Management:** Complete product catalog with images, SKU, barcode, categories, pricing (cost/selling), and stock status
**Customer Relationship Management (CRM):** Comprehensive customer database with purchase history, segmentation, and loyalty tracking
**Order Processing Workflow:** End-to-end order management from creation to fulfillment with customizable status tracking
**Financial Analytics Dashboard:** Real-time revenue, costs, profit margins, and financial performance indicators
**User Role & Permission System:** Granular permission control with predefined roles (Admin, Accountant, Sales Manager, etc.)
**Advanced Reporting System:** Sales reports, inventory reports, customer analytics, financial statements, and custom reports
**Tax & Invoice Management:** Saudi VAT-compliant invoicing system with tax number tracking and invoice customization
**Shipping & Delivery Management:** Multiple shipping methods with cost calculation, tracking, and logistics management
**Company Profile Management:** Complete business information including tax number, address, logo, and contact details
**Automated Backup System:** Scheduled database backups with automatic and manual restore options
**Notification System:** Customizable alerts for low stock, new orders, and system events
**Print & Export Configuration:** Customizable printing settings for invoices, receipts, and reports with company branding
**Help Desk & Support System:** Integrated help center with FAQs, user guides, video tutorials, and support ticket system
**Best-Selling Products Analysis:** Sales performance tracking with product ranking and category-wise sales distribution
**Profit Margin Analysis:** Detailed profit calculation with cost distribution analysis (goods, operations, shipping, etc.)
**Customer Growth Tracking:** New customer acquisition metrics and customer retention rate monitoring
**Inventory Value Tracking:** Total inventory value calculation with stock status indicators (Sufficient, Low, Out-of-stock)
**Responsive Mobile-First Design:** Optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices with intuitive navigation
**Data Security & Access Control:** Secure authentication, encrypted data storage, and audit logging

title: Wesham Consulting Landing Page
description: A modern, responsive landing page for Wesham Management Consulting - a Saudi consulting firm specializing in digital transformation, business process development, organizational restructuring, strategic planning, and risk management. The website showcases their services, vision, and expertise in empowering businesses with strategic solutions.
features: **Modern Responsive Design:** Fully responsive website that works seamlessly across all devices - desktop, tablet, and mobile
**Service Showcase Section:** Clear presentation of Wesham's consulting services including Digital Transformation, Business Process Development, and Organizational Restructuring
**Company Identity Section:** Highlights the company's vision, goals, and position as a leading Saudi consulting entity
**Contact Form Integration:** Functional contact form with fields for name, email, phone, and message description
**About Us & Expertise:** Detailed sections showcasing the company's experience in Saudi Arabia, business development, and project management
**Client-Focused Layout:** Strategic organization of information to guide potential clients through services and value proposition
**Clean Navigation:** Intuitive site structure with clear sections for services, about, and contact information
**Professional Branding:** Consistent use of company branding and professional imagery throughout the website
**Strategic Content Presentation:** Well-structured content that communicates expertise in management consulting and strategic planning
**Arabic & English Content Support:** Designed to accommodate both Arabic and English content for wider audience reach

title: MaxBot Discord Bot
description: A comprehensive Discord bot with advanced server security, moderation, and backup features. Includes Max Bot Support system with server analytics, automated logging, blacklist management, and anti-spam protection. Complete dashboard for server configuration with real-time monitoring and safety scoring.
features: **Welcome System:** Customizable welcome messages, images, and departure messages for new members
**Auto-Reply System:** Intelligent auto-response to specific keywords and phrases with random reply variations
**User Verification:** Member verification system to ensure community safety and authenticity
**Profile Customization:** User profile backgrounds store with filters and categories (Women, Movies, Games, Music, Sports, Nature)
**Ranking & Level System:** Point-based ranking with levels (up to level 60) and achievement badges
**Interaction Tracking:** Voice and chat interaction points system for user activity monitoring
**Auto-Role Assignment:** Automatic role assignment for new members upon joining
**Profile Preview:** Real-time profile customization preview with statistics display
**Reward System:** Coins and rewards for achieving specific milestones (Diamond: 20,000 coins, Crown: 100,000 coins)
**Advanced Security System:** Max Bot Support with server safety scoring and danger level monitoring
**Bot Access Control:** Disallow unauthorized bots from entering the server with configurable restrictions
**Smart Kick & Ban System:** Maximum limit of 3 kicks/bans per day for admins with automatic permission management
**Blacklist Management:** Temporary member blacklisting instead of permanent removal to preserve server member count
**Content Moderation:** Automated detection and deletion of repeated spam messages
**Link Control System:** Selective allowance of Discord server invites and external links (YouTube, Facebook, etc.)
**Bad Words Filter:** Configurable bad word detection with customizable punishments (warn, mute, kick)
**Channel-Specific Rules:** Set different rules for specific channels including picture-only channels and bot command channels
**Server Backup:** Complete server backup functionality including categories, channels, roles, and settings with timestamp tracking
**Admin Management:** Search and select admins with configurable permissions and limits
**Server Analytics Dashboard:** Real-time monitoring of members, bots, roles, and channels with danger level indicators

title: KOSA Services - Local Services Platform UI Design
description: A complete UI/UX design for a local services platform connecting customers with skilled workers. Features include dual-verification authentication, employee registration, location-based service selection, and secure payment processing. Designed specifically for the Egyptian market with Arabic/English support.
features: **Dual Verification System:** Secure authentication via SMS or email OTP codes
**Employee Registration:** Special form for service providers with document upload
**Location-Based Services:** Select service area with geographic zone selection
**Service Booking Flow:** Multi-step process from selection to payment
**Secure Payment Processing:** OTP-verified transactions for wallet and VISA payments
**Password Management:** Complete reset and change password functionality
**Mobile-Optimized Design:** Responsive interface for smartphone users
**Bilingual Interface:** Arabic/English support for Egyptian market
**Service Management:** Create and manage service listings with pricing
**User Onboarding:** Welcome screens and guided first-time experience
